name: King of Fate
description:
King of Fate is based on real history and will take you back to the chaotic era of the Warring States Period. Real-time strategy and real-time control. You will command the famous generals of the world to fight fiercely on the battlefield, gather hundreds of celebrities to govern the country and the people, and sweep Liuhe like the first emperor to rule the world, dominate the rise and fall of the empire, and the great changes in civilization. We look forward to your joining, Your Majesty!

Fighting Heroes

The game fully restores the large map of many vassal regimes, bringing together the historical and military generals of the Spring and Autumn Three Kingdoms, including a large number of fierce generals, advisers, heroes and beauties: Baiqi, the God of Killing, Sun Wu, the Soldier, Zhuge, the Flying General Lu Bu, Guan Yu, the Tiangong, Zhangjiao, Closed Moon Diaochan Celebrities gather, and the crowd competes for the throne.

Majestic battlefield

On the same big sand table map, players from all servers fight strategically and fight fiercely for hegemony. They lead infantry, archers, cavalry, chariots and other arms to engage in diversified wars such as field battles, team battles, city battles, and national wars. The battlefield situation is treacherous, Millions of soldiers, gorgeous special effects, all players' actions such as city building, fighting monsters in the wild, marching and fighting are displayed in the same map, realizing the real ten thousand people fighting for hegemony, uniting vertically and horizontally, and conquering cities and territories!

Super fast pace

The game has changed the slow-paced mode of traditional SLG games, and created an innovative small-scale fast-paced strategic gameplay, ultra-fast-paced battles and marches, and a real-time combat mode that follows the control and battle, allowing you to be on the scene and bring the strategy of war to the fullest Ultimate, experience the ever-changing ancient battlefield, blood agitation!

End game quality

All-round optimization and improvement for PC configuration can maximize the hardware strength, overall operation stability, mouse smoothness acceleration, frame rate, etc., and the operating experience is comprehensively improved, bringing stunning picture effects.
